titleStmt.title: An admonition to the fault fynder.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: An admonition to the fault fynder.

monogr.title: A most excellent treatise of the begynnyng of heresyes in oure tyme, compyled by the Reuerend Father in God Stanislaus Hosius Byshop of Wormes in Prussia. To the moste renomed Prynce Lorde Sigismund myghtie Kyng of Poole, greate Duke of Luten and Russia, Lorde and heyre of all Prussia, Masouia, Samogitia &c. Translated out of Laten in to Englyshe by Richard Shacklock M. of Arte, and student of the ciuil lawes, and intituled by hym: The hatchet of heresies
monogr.author: Hozjusz, Stanisław

div.head: An admonition to the fault fynder.
div.l: If mo faultes in this boke thou fynd
Yet think not the correctoure blynde.
If Argos here hym selffe had bene
He sholde perchaūce not all haue sene
Al wordes awry mend without stryffe
And wordes amēded, redresse thy lyffe.
